== dhcp ==

dhcp is dhcp daemon for allow dhcp IP distribution for Data Node and Name Node

=== installation ===

{{{
yum install dhcp
}}}

=== edit configuration ==

edit /etc/dhcp/dhcpd.conf

{{{
include "/etc/dhcp/dhcpd.pod";
}}}

make dhcp information (/etc/dhcp/dhcpd.pod)
